title: riot can you undo whatever in the absolute FUCK you did to cho gath?
body: seriously he was FINE the way he was do you LIKE seeing people complain about how broken champions and items are? stop fixing what isnt broken im telling it is damn near impossible to fight someone that can one shot over 1k of you HP with true damage while being hard as fuck to kill in the process. revert the damn changes

replies.body:
Cho'Gath isn't the problem, stoneplate and the fact that his ult does true damage to champions is the problem 

Either have his ult do magic damage, or reduce the + total health ratio on the stoneplate active
Just have his ULT scale of ULT attacks rather than bonus health, then it will be fixed.
